mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING_AVG (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, THING_AMT, COUNT_ALL) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, AVG(THING_AMT), COUNT(*) FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT_AVG (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, GRFE, RTFE, RENT_SE, COUNT_ALL) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, AVG(GRFE), AVG(RTFE), RENT_SE, COUNT(*) FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '월세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_JEONSE_AVG (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, GRFE, RENT_SE, COUNT_ALL) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, AVG(GRFE), RENT_SE, COUNT(*) FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '전세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, THING_AMT, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, MAX(THING_AMT), 'MAX' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, THING_AMT, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, MIN(THING_AMT), 'MIN' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_BUYING WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, GRFE, RTFE, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, MAX(GRFE), MAX(RTFE), 'MAX' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '월세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, GRFE, RTFE, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, MIN(GRFE), MIN(RTFE), 'MIN' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '월세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_JEONSE_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, GRFE, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, MAX(GRFE), 'MAX' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '전세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG

INSERT INTO EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_JEONSE_MINMAX (CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, GRFE, M_TYPE) SELECT CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG, RENT_SE, MIN(GRFE), 'MIN' FROM EPL_SEOUL.REALTY_RENT WHERE CGG_NM = #{guName} AND BLDG_USG = #{buildingUse} AND RENT_SE = '전세' GROUP BY CGG_NM, STDG_NM, RCPT_YR, BLDG_USG
